Text:
Can you please upload "In My Father's Den" please? I want the one available on Rapid-share (not any of those with Swedish subs hardcoded). Here's the link to the Rapid-share file:

www.gappon.com/in-my-fathers-den-2004-dvdrip-ac3-xvid-tar-318506.html

I would have done it myself if I could. But unfortunately I'm unable to download it; probably due to some problem with my ISP. I'll be infinitely grateful to u if u can upload it. Thanks.

PS: Sorry if this ain't the right place to make a request, but I don't know where else am I supposed to do it.
